action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Research and Technology.

bill.summary: This bill prohibits the National Science Foundation from obligating any amounts for the Polar Learning and Responding Climate Change Educational Partnership. (The Partnership uses novel educational approaches to engage adult learners and inform public understanding and response to climate change.)
